entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @LindseyGrahamSC Um Lindsey have you looked in the mirror lately? The insane stupidity Team R drives daily is entirely moving the country left. You'll note for example 80% of the country wants a Federal Response to COVID19. Who do you think you're addressing in tjis rant? Dying elderly R donors?
